name: Screenreading
body:
### Readme

Here you will find all of the materials for this course.  To the left, you can download everything in one .zip file (which is what most of you will want), .tar (for Windows users), or view the entire changelog for all course documents on GitHub.

### Contents

The archived file you download will contain 

* latest versions of the syllabus in .pdf and .md formats (for those of you unfamiliar with markdown, see [Andrew Goldstone's pr√©cis](http://andrewgoldstone.com/md/))
* full text of all readings available online and in the public domain
* assignments
* a bibliography of all readings relevant to the topic -- this bibliography is in [BibTeX](http://www.bibtex.org/) format, a plain text file that can easily be imported to bibliographic management software like [Zotero](http://www.zotero.org/support/kb/importing).

![Grant Snyder, "The Book of the Future," *New York Times* March 30, 2012](http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2012/04/01/books/review/01snider2-img/01snider2-img-popup-v2.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
